title: Piranha II: The Spawning (1981) (Score) - Stelvio Cipriani
description:
The score to James Cameron&#039;s mess of a film is here. This movie is widely regarded as a turd of a film. And I think one of the reasons why this film doesn&#039;t work is because I saw somewhere on TV that James couldn&#039;t figure out how to operate the Italian film editing machine. Don&#039;t know how accurate that is. The American "R" rated print is cut. The Japanese version is longer and features more nudity, dialogue, character development and gore. The score is better than the movie. Worth downloading.
